head.supplied: 14/10/68 ¶ I will be very happy, dear Mr Rawlins, to be the means of communicating your letters to the scientific gentlemen whom you just addressed. I am so busy with my departmental & special literar...

div.p: MS 11663 Royal Society of Victoria records, box 2/2, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

I will be very happy, dear Mr Rawlins, to be the means of communicating your letters to the scientific gentlemen whom you just addressed. I am so busy with my departmental & special literary work, that I cannot possibly devote at present any time to the Royal Society. I have shown however my love for its welfare during earlier years of its existence, when I spent really much time on the Society. But then the great universal work on the plants of Australia had not commenced.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller
MS annotation: 'Dated 14 | Recd 17 | Ansd nil | Oct 1868 '. Letter not found.
